results.title: Racial and ethnic differences in response to treatment for Marfan syndrome.
results.text_hl: The 2014 Pediatric Heart Network randomised trial of @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Marfan_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008382 @@@Marfan syndrome@@@ paediatric and young adult @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ showed no treatment differences in the rate of aortic root growth over 3 years; however, they did not examine racial/ethnic differences, and recent data suggest that angiotensin receptor blockers may have different pharmacologic effects in different racial/ethnic populations.

citations.NLM: Ayers R, Kelleman M, Iannucci G, McCracken C, Oster ME. Racial and ethnic differences in response to treatment for Marfan syndrome. Cardiol Young. 2021 Dec;31(12):1991-1998. PMID: 33845931

results.title: Recruitment, retention, and adherence in a clinical trial: The Pediatric Heart Network's Marfan Trial experience.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND/AIMS: The Pediatric Heart Network @<m>DISEASE_Marfan_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008382 @@@Marfan@@@ Trial was a randomized trial comparing @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ versus @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ on @DISEASE_Aortic_Root_Aneurysm @DISEASE_MESH:D000094628 @@@aortic root dilation@@@ in 608 children and young adults with @<m>DISEASE_Marfan_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008382 @@@Marfan syndrome@@@.
